dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach financial risks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take bold and swift decisions, often prioritizing potential gains over stability.
Your FarTwin will approach risks with a measured and deliberate mindset, weighing the pros and cons carefully.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin engage with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be sociable and engaging, often taking the lead in group discussions and networking events.
Your FarTwin will prefer smaller, more low-key gatherings and might need time to warm up to new social situations.

dimensions.label: Earning Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin pursue income opportunities?

options.description: Your FarTwin will strive for financial success through hard work, dedication, and calculated risk-taking.
Your FarTwin will approach earning opportunities with a more laid-back attitude, prioritizing stability over rapid growth.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin tackle complex challenges?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach problems with a logical and methodical mindset, breaking them down into manageable parts.
Your FarTwin will rely on their instincts and gut feelings to guide decision-making, often trusting their initial impressions.

dimensions.label: Growth Orientation
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach personal growth?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize rapid progress and self-improvement, often seeking out new experiences and challenges.
Your FarTwin will focus on introspection and self-awareness, taking time to reflect on their actions and thoughts before making changes.

dimensions.label: Attention Span
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin stay focused?

options.description: Your FarTwin will maintain a steady, sustained attention span, able to focus on a single task for extended periods.
Your FarTwin will juggle multiple tasks and interests simultaneously, effortlessly switching between different activities and topics.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin absorb new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prefer learning through verbal instruction, discussions, and debates.
Your FarTwin will learn best through visual aids like images, videos, and diagrams.

dimensions.label: Technological Comfort
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with technology?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be highly comfortable and proficient with various digital tools, platforms, and software.
Your FarTwin will approach technology with a healthy dose of skepticism, often preferring traditional methods over digital alternatives.
